title: BMW Japan Celebrates 50 Years of 3 Series With Exclusive Limited Edition
description: BMW is celebrating 50 years of the iconic 3 Series in style — with a Japan-exclusive 50th Anniversary Special Limited Edition spanning everything from diesel wagons to M-badged sedans. It’s a nod to the past, dressed in modern tailoring — and limited to just 710 units. First launched ...
titleSummary: "Golden Milestone: BMW Japan Honors Half Century of 3 Series with Luxe Commemorative Model"
descriptionSummary: To commemorate 50 years of its iconic 3 Series, BMW is releasing a highly exclusive Japan-only edition, available in various models including diesel wagons and high-performance M-badged sedans, limited to just 710 examples worldwide.

title: Why Dealers Don't Understand Buyers' Needs
description: If you thought that car dealers didn’t truly understand current consumer sentiment, that gap is only growing. That’s the finding of an Urban Science/Harris Poll of 254 original equipment manufacturer (OEM) car dealers and 3,026 U.S. car customers who own or lease a vehicle, or intend to within 12 ...
titleSummary: "Lack of Connection: Dealers Struggle to Meet Buyer Expectations"
descriptionSummary: A widening disconnect between car dealerships and their customers has been revealed by a recent survey, which highlights the significant gap in understanding consumer sentiment among original equipment manufacturer dealerships.

title: Volkswagen Retires Touareg After 24 Years — Tayron to Replace It
description: After more than two decades at the top of VW’s lineup, the Touareg is heading for retirement. Reports confirm the flagship SUV will bow out by 2026, with no direct replacement planned. Instead, VW will focus on more affordable, flexible models like the Tayron — and in doing ...
titleSummary: Touareg Era Ends: Volkswagen Bids Farewell as New Tayron Takes the Wheel
descriptionSummary: The Volkswagen Touareg, a stalwart of the automaker's lineup for over 20 years, is set to make way for new models by 2026. Its retirement will pave the way for more affordable and versatile SUVs like the Tayron.

title: I Spent Two Weeks Driving a Polaris Slingshot. Here's My Brutally Honest Review
description: Sometimes you need to toss out logic to really enjoy something. That’s the case with the Slingshot. descriptionSummary: Embracing absurdity is essential for experiencing the thrill of the Slingshot. Despite its inexcusable noise and impractical design, this unconventional vehicle defies logic and leaves a lasting impression, providing an exhilarating taste of weightlessness on wheels.

title: Rezvani Retro RR1 Is A 750-HP Tribute To The Porsche 935
